english.segment1: So faithful. So constant. So loving and so true. So powerful in all You do.
english.segment2: You fill me. You see me. You know my every move. and You love for me to sing to You.
english.segment3: I know that You are for me. I know that You are for me. I know that You will never, forsake me in my weaknesses
english.segment4: I know that You have come now, even if to write upon my heart. To remind me who You are.
english.segment5: So patient, So gracious, So merciful and trueÂ…. So wonderful in all You do. You know me. You see me. You know my every move. You love for me to sing to You
english.segment6: Lord, I know that You are for me. I know that You are for me. I know that You will never, forsake me in my weaknesses. I know that You have come now, even if to write upon my heart.
english.segment7: To remind me that. I know that You are for me. I know that You are for me. I know that You will never, forsake me in my weaknesses. I know that You have come now, even if to write upon my heart. To remind me who You are.
english.segment8: I know that You are for me. I know that You are for me. I know that You will never, forsake me in my weaknesses. I know that You will come now, even if to write upon my heart. To remind me of who You are.
